articles.title: Ford will introduce seven new EVs in Europe by 2024 - Engadget
articles.description: Ford plans to introduce seven new EVs in Europe by 2024, including an electric Puma and Transit van..
articles.content: Ford is quickly making good on its promise to go all-electric in Europe. The company now plans to introduce seven new EVs in Europe by 2024. The lineup will focus on crossovers, including an electric… [+1540 chars]
